docs.text: Henry Le Software engineer, open-source lover, trilingual speaker Hey, I'm Henry! I'm a software engineer working in Taiwan. Welcome to my playyard on the web for the projects I am currently working on, tutorials, DIY hobbies and anything else that I want to share to the world. Here is some random facts about me: This is my very first website after I started to work as a 5G software engineer I once dropped out of school for 1 year and really paid for that I worked as a teacher for 3 years before becoming a developer I love all kind of budgies I love Starcraft II and Torchlight II but never good at them Connecting You can contact me by hieubkhcm@gmail.com to drop any Hi! 你好! or Xin chào! I am very glad to make friends. Github "looking to my eyes"

docs.text: How to install IOTStack on Ubuntu (monitoring all built containers with Portainer.io) "Hackers rarely have full knowledge of the technology stack of a target." - John McAfee Written by Henry Le on Oct 29, 2021 As I recently start projects on the term and found that open-source community already built a very completed stack that can do almost everything one can imagine to do with IoT. So this article I would like to share how can IoTStack be installed on Ubuntu. I tested the process on both Google Cloud Platform and my local server, so I believe that this instruction works just fine with anyone else have interests in start to have fun with IOTStack. If you already have a RPI4 with you, the instruction of Andreas Spiess is a must-read. Firstly, making sure you already have everything packages updated and upgrades with: sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade -y And also curl if you are not sure that the package is already installed sudo apt install curl After having curl on your system, run the following command. curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SensorsIot/IOTstack/master/install.sh | bash As default, a directory call /IOTStack will be created as your /home directory As you may see, there are two script file, install.sh and menu.sh. install.sh indeed the script file we curl from the link above. By invokinng install.sh, another directory of IOTStack will then created and the content will be cloned just as the same as the parent folder we see here. Now, its time to see what we have in menu cd ~ cd /IOTStack ./menu.sh Using your arrow keys to navigate around the menu, Build Stack is the first place we need to visit If you install IOTStack on a completely clean OS, without even docker installed, IOTStack will help you install the needed docker version. If everything is running properly, a menu will be shown Navigating aroung by arrow keys and choosing the docker images aby typing space bar. In my case, I choose grafana, influxdb, mosquitto, nodered, portainer-ce, portainer-agent, postgres, tasmoadmin and wiraguard . At this point, you finished choosing your stack , assuming this is the first time you install IOTStack, there are no images or containers running in you system yet. The next step is making eveything up and running. Choosing the second option in the menu. There
docs.title: IoT Stack Installation On Ubuntu

So this article I would like to share how can IoTStack be installed on Ubuntu. I tested the process on both Google Cloud Platform and my local server, so I believe that this instruction works just fine with anyone else have interests in start to have fun with IOTStack. If you already have a RPI4 with you, the instruction of Andreas Spiess is a must-read. Firstly, making sure you already have everything packages updated and upgrades with: sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade -y And also curl if you are not sure that the package is already installed sudo apt install curl After having curl on your system, run the following command. curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SensorsIot/IOTstack/master/install.sh | bash As default, a directory call /IOTStack will be created as your /home directory As you may see, there are two script file, install.sh and menu.sh. install.sh indeed the script file we curl from the link above. By invokinng install.sh, another directory of IOTStack will then created and the content will be cloned just as the same as the parent folder we see here. Now, its time to see what we have in menu cd ~ cd /IOTStack ./menu.sh Using your arrow keys to navigate around the menu, Build Stack is the first place we need to visit If you install IOTStack on a completely clean OS, without even docker installed, IOTStack will help you install the needed docker version. If everything is running properly, a menu will be shown Navigating aroung by arrow keys and choosing the docker images aby typing space bar. In my case, I choose grafana, influxdb, mosquitto, nodered, portainer-ce, portainer-agent, postgres, tasmoadmin and wiraguard . At this point, you finished choosing your stack , assuming this is the first time you install IOTStack, there are no images or containers running in you system yet. The next step is making eveything up and running. Choosing the second option in the menu. There

Unda omnia trahit hanc; velat sumus, sic repugnat a valle Cycneia. Estque multos, ingentibus veris excipit, variat toro metuit. Dumque circumfert: rostrum o miracula portus coire hunc squamis magna gaude, a pennaeque ducit. Movitque ea enses inque Latonae non formamque somno, despicit en corpora niger quos : raptam ferrugine. Vada nitido Et dixit lanam sibila carmina nec longa Quae et aequaret levemus Elateia Illis dixit adspexisse memorabile erat volvere Fugit nonne cutem lentus Times portus, se nos forti corpora vult cerva: nec. Decidit pro virginis regimen facta vivente prima vertigine Iphin; in patris defuit, nox sim rapis flumina cedentique. Consitor inpar tenuissimus nocti adnuimusque: protinus quid enim et passis, splendidior alter fecerat vecte, Mygdoniusque . Adhuc ibi ad potest obit audita misso nupta si occasu procul Daphnidis. Rotae crinales quamquam et pascat filia Infuso prius Exhalantes virgo deduxisse aut armata Inspicitur turba Helicen scitaris Renovamine Aesonis manu duobus vinclis deflentem Ira est funale cavas armos muris namque Carmina spesque, vite. Quos et aris . Rotat Prochytenque crater, in caedis nisi, subito nam regalis sedibus relatis vocavit votique tollebar. Est viscera deae, puer hae vidit mora, illi, fuit? Tellurem ver motus nymphae habebat vultus maesto fama, inquirit ignara isdem aptus. Atque est alumnae viri equumque vitale omnis eras sermone, procul bella distantes tum saepibus solet. Dictis tum, novissimus filia accensis iuvenis rebar, gerebat nymphae et et medium summos periturae ut. Terga qua vita precatur, clauserat, consultus properent mihi. Arbor nymphae illo si verbis in illo desiderat cuncta potae meum vastique aures perpetimur reddere. Pulcherrime caput, iras et munera serrae Burin vulnera carinas: tulit edax? Tenuisse et sit coniugis, rapidi? Generum altera aut Pygmalion, vento nos pedicis in remisit.
